snippet: Denying a request by Elliott Associates, a South Korean court will allow a shareholder meeting of Samsung C&T where a vote is to be held on the deal.
abstract: DealBook Online; South Korean court denies effort by investor Paul E Singer to stop shareholders' vote on proposed merger between two Samsung subsidiaries.
lead_paragraph: Denying a request by Elliott Associates, a South Korean court will allow a shareholder meeting of Samsung C&T where a vote is to be held on the deal.

headline.main: Court Rejects Investor’s Move to Disrupt Samsung Merger
